biotools.summary: SCIGA is a software for 10X single cell immunoglobulin repertoires analysis. It uses raw reads or output of Cellranger as input, and performs reads quality control, immunoglobulin sequence assembly, sequence annotation, heavy- and light- chain pairing, computing statistics and visualizing.
